title: DOJ Lays Claim to 2 Luxury Jets Allegedly Owned by Sam Bankman-Fried
description: Island Air Capital has disputed the DOJ's move to forfeit the two jets totaling $28 million, claiming the aircrafts belonged to it.

title: The Trial of Sam Bankman-Fried: Live Blog, Latest News and Insights
description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried faces seven criminal charges related to the dramatic collapse of his crypto empire. Here's the latest on his trial.

title: DOJ Eyes Seizure of Ex-FTX Chief’s Two Luxury Jets in Ongoing Criminal Probe
description: In the ongoing criminal case against Sam Bankman-Fried, federal prosecutors have unveiled a forfeiture bill, indicating the Department of Justice’s (DOJ) intent to commandeer two luxury jets belonging to the ex-FTX chief. Specifically, the DOJ has its sights set on a Bombardier Global 5000 BD-700-1A11 and an Embraer Legacy 135BJ. Prosecutors Set Sights on Seizing […]

title: Meta Introduces AI Features for Advertisers: A Potential Game-Changer
description: Meta, the social media giant formerly known as Facebook, is making bold strides in the generative artificial intelligence (AI) market, taking on established players like Google and OpenAI. With the recent rollout of groundbreaking generative AI features, Meta aims to revolutionize the way advertisers create content and streamline their operations. title: Anthropic’s capital boost may secure full recovery for FTX customers
description: The recent surge in Anthropic's valuation, following a new funding round, could spell financial recovery for FTX creditors.

title: Juror Reveals Ties to FTX-Linked Law Firm During SBF Trial Selection
description:
In a recent update regarding the trial of former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF), it has been revealed that a diverse group of 12 jurors has been carefully selected to determine his fate. These jurors were chosen from a pool of 45 candidates during the trial’s second day in Manhattan, New York City, United States. […]

The post Juror Reveals Ties to FTX-Linked Law Firm During SBF Trial Selection appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Analyst Says He’s ‘Extremely Bullish’ on Top-20 Ethereum-Based Altcoin in Coming Months – But There’s a Catch
description:
A closely followed crypto strategist remains confident in his bullish position on one top-20 altcoin project. Pseudonymous analyst Altcoin Sherpa tells his 196,600 followers on the social media platform X that decentralized oracle provider Chainlink (LINK) is showing strength during the choppy crypto markets. However, he warns that LINK remains in an enduring trading range […]
